CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name = 'Sales' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), 'NEW', IF( RecordType.Name = 'Renewal' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Lost'), 'CHURN', IF( RecordType.Name = 'Renewal' && ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), IF( ARR__c - ARR_Up_For_Renewal__c > 0, 'UP', IF( ARR__c - ARR_Up_For_Renewal__c < 0, 'DOWN', 'FLAT' ) ), NULL ) ) )
CustomField.label: Revenue Movement Type
